content.text:
# 1872 Mudgee colonial by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Mudgee on 2 January 1872 because of the resignation of Henry Stephen.
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 13 December 1871
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly and close of electoral rolls.
|-
| 28 December 1871
| Nominations
|-
| 2 January 1872
| Polling day
|-
| 16 January 1872
| Return of writ
|}
Results
}}
Henry Stephen resigned.
See also
*Electoral results for the district of Mudgee
*List of New South Wales state by-elections
